Plot: El Fin is comedy about the end of the world. Depressed by the recent death of his parents and losing his job, Nico; an ordinary 26 year old, decides to take refuge in his house for six ...
Title: El Fin
Writer: Antonio Chamu, Miguel Alejandro Gomez, Charlie Van Vleet
Actors: Luis Carlos Bogantes, Kurt Dyer, Álvaro Marenco, Pablo Masís
